body: Oppai-chan thinks something is wrong and her son isn't being honest with her. She seems to get the idea that he's getting bullied so she does the standard sex for no bullying trade. It seems the whole thing was a misunderstanding and she only made things significantly worse. I don't speak japanese and I certainly can't read it but the title translates to something like "Oblivious mother and the bullying classmates" so  that's my guess. NICE TIDDIES
